args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Winch Strap May Fail Allowing Boat to Detach

White River Marine Group LLC (WRMG) is recalling certain 2024-2025 Tracker Marine Trailstar TRL and Topper boat trailers.  The winch strap may fray after contacting the crossbar and break, allowing the boat to detach from the trailer.A detached boat can become a road hazard, increasing the risk of a crash or injury.

Number of Units Affected: 2164.0"
